summary: Where to send the queries related to portal and approval related issues for the approval process 2023-24?
content: Institutes are requested to raise queries only through online Central Support System (CSS) available on AICTE website under Approval Process 2023-24 quick links. No queries through email will be entertained.

summary: If I have a problem with respect to the application while applying, whom to contact and where to contact?
content: Institutes should contact through the online Central Support System (CSS) available on AICTE website under Approval Process 2023-24 quick links for application-related issues.

summary: Can a new institute apply for UG and PG in Engineering and Technology?
content: No, the institute can opt for a UG program only. For PG Courses, the institute shall require NBA accreditation.

summary: How much land is required for the establishment of a New Engineering College with a UG program?
content: There is no such minimum land requirement. The institute should have the required built-up area and land as per FSI/FAR as applicable (Rural/Urban/Mega/Metro Cities).

summary: Is approval for new and existing Pharmacy and Architecture Institute/Program discontinued?
content: Yes, as per Honâ€™ble Apex Court Order.

summary: Can a new institute apply for multiple programs?
content: Yes, a new institute may apply for one or more Program(s)/Level(s).

summary: Which courses can a new institute opt for?
content: A new institute is required to opt for a minimum of THREE core branches and ONE Emerging area course.

summary: If a new institute applies for Multiple Programs for UG (E&T) and MBA, what will be the Security Deposit amount?
content: The Security Deposit shall be the addition of all Program(s)/Level(s) applied for.

summary: How many Emerging Courses can a new institute opt for?
content: A new institute is required to opt for THREE core branches and ONE Emerging area in Engineering and Technology. Other courses can be opted in the Emerging Area with a maximum ceiling of 360 in each Level(s).

summary: As a new institute, on which website can I submit the application?
content: The new institution is required to visit NSWS website to create login credentials & select AICTE approval under the approval tab for navigating to AICTE portal.
